	style = 2	

	date = { day = 9 month = may year = 1948 }

		name = "A new era start today"
		command = { type = dissent value = 15  }			
	}
}

event = {
id = 278012
random = no
country = COL
style = 2

trigger = {
	flag = COL_FASCIST
}

name = "Economic Protectionism"
desc = "Our industry is not competitive right now to enter the global market, we must protect it while at the same time invest in modernising it."
picture = "news_paper"

date = { day = 15 month = july year = 1948 }


action_a = {
ai_chance = 70
name = "Our industries have to be protected from foreign competition!"
command = ( type = dissent value = 2 }
command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = -2 }
command = { type = industrial_modifier which = total value = -2 } 

}
action_b = {
ai_chance = 30
name = "The Free Market must remain free, protectionism will make it harder to recover"
command = ( type = dissent value = 2 }
command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = 2 }
command = { type = industrial_modifier which = total value = -5 } 
}
}

	id = 278016
	country = COL

	style = 2

	trigger = {
		flag = COL_FASCIST

	name = "Economical plans"
	desc = "We need a strong corporative system economy, but in a short or long period ?"

	date = { day = 10 month = june year = 1949 }

		name = "5 Year Plan"
		ai_chance = 75

	action_a = {
		name = "Central corporation, the Colombian way to Fascism"

		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = 2 }

		command = { type = metalpool value = -100 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 10}
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -50 }

	action_b = {
		name = "Let farming be run by local corporation"
		ai_chance = 45
		command = { type = supplies value = -30 }
		command = { type = metalpool value = -10 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = 2 }				
	}

		name = "The government shouldn't care so much about the peasant, it will take care of itself."
		ai_chance = 10
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = 1 }				
	}
}

	picture = "news_paper"

	date = { day = 2 month = march year = 1950 }

	action = {
		ai_chance = 90
		name = "Gran Columbia rebirth"
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
		command = { type = setflag which = COL_FASCIST2 }
		command = { type = flag_ext where = -1 which = "_fas"}
		command = { type = name where = -1 which = "State of Gran Columbia" }
	}

	action = {
		ai_chance = 10
		name = "It's not necessary"
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
		command = { type = domestic which = democratic value = 1 }
	}

}

event = {
	id = 278025
	country = COL
	picture = "news_paper"
	style = 2

	trigger = {
		flag = COL_FASCIST
		exists = SOV		
		NOT = {
			atwar = COL			
		}
		event = 90000556 #no more Hitler ...
	}

	name = "Request to become an Axis member"
	desc = "Request to become an Axis member"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
	offset = 35
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1959 }

	action_a = {
		trigger = {
			government = { type = fascist country = GER }
		}
		name = "Move towards Germany and Axis"
		ai_chance = 70
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 5 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = SOV value = -175 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = GER value = 175 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = ITA value = 175 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = CHC value = -150 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = ENG value = -150 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = USA value = -150 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 278019 }
	}

	action_b = {
		name = "We have to rebuild our nation before we embark in international alliances"
		ai_chance = 30
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -4 }
		command = { type = building_prod_mod which = ic value = 10 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = SOV value = -50 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = GER value = 50}
		command = { type = set_relation which = ITA value = 50 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = ENG value = 50 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = USA value = 50 }
	}

}

event = {
	id = 278026
	random = no
	country = GER
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	name = "Accept Colombia into Axis?"
	desc = "Colombia has decided to fully join our struggle. Shall we accept them as the newest members of the Axis?"

	action = {
		ai_chance = 10
		name = "Total alliance"
		command = { type = alliance which = COL }
	}

	action = {
		ai_chance = 80
		name = "Guarantee Independence"
		command = { type = 	guarantee which = GER where = COL }
	}

	action = {
		ai_chance = 10
		name = "They are so far away ... "
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 278027
	random = no
	country = COL
	style = 2

	name = "Retaking Eastern Gran Colombia"
	desc = "The government of Venezuela is the most powerful of our enemies, and crushing them will go a long way towards proving our legitimacy as Gran Colombia. Shall we proceed?"
	picture = "bra_revolution"
	decision_picture = "decision_french_mobilization_b"

	date = { day = 1 month = june year = 1951 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

	decision_trigger = {
		flag = COL_FASCIST
		NOT = {
			atwar = COL
			ispuppet = COL 		
			alliance = { country = VEN country = COL }				
		}
	}	

	trigger = {
		flag = COL_FASCIST
		NOT = {
			atwar = COL
			ispuppet = COL 
		}
	}


	action = {
		ai_chance = 60
		name = "Let us reclaim our rightful land!"
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		command = { type = ai_prepare_war which = VEN }
	}

	action = {
		ai_chance = 40
		name = "We will strike at a later time"
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = VEN value = 40 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 278029
	random = no
	country = COL
	style = 2

	name = "Raise up a claim about Panama"
	desc = "Panama has always remained a sore spot for us, having been taken from us by America in 1903. The Canal is one of the central routes of international trade and would be very useful for our newly reformed nation. Now it is time to take it back..."
	picture = "bra_revolution"
	decision_picture = "decision_french_mobilization_b"

	date = { day = 1 month = june year = 1952 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

	decision_trigger = {
		flag = COL_FASCIST		
		NOT = {
			atwar = COL
			ispuppet = COL 
			alliance = { country = PAN country = COL }
		}
	}

	trigger = {
		flag = COL_FASCIST		
		NOT = {
			atwar = COL
			ispuppet = COL 
			alliance = { country = PAN country = COL }
		}		
	}

	action = {
		ai_chance = 100
		name = "Let us reclaim our rightful land!"
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		command = { type = add_claim_area which = "Panaman Ridge" }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -100 }
		command = { type = relation which = PAN value = -100 }
	}

}
